installCommand: FLUTTER_ROOT="$PWD/.flutter"; export FLUTTER_ROOT FLUTTER_INSTALL_DIR="$FLUTTER_ROOT"; export PATH="$FLUTTER_ROOT/flutter/bin:$PATH" NPM_CONFIG_REGISTRY="https://registry.npmjs.org/" NPM_FALLBACK_REGISTRY="https://registry.npmmirror.com/"; git config --global --add safe.directory "$FLUTTER_ROOT/flutter" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; npm config set registry "$NPM_CONFIG_REGISTRY" --location=project >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; bash deploy/install_flutter.sh; npm install --registry="$NPM_CONFIG_REGISTRY" --prefix server || npm install --registry="$NPM_FALLBACK_REGISTRY" --prefix server
buildCommand: FLUTTER_ROOT="$PWD/.flutter"; export PATH="$FLUTTER_ROOT/flutter/bin:$PATH"; cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release
